blog.name: story-kat
blog.title: Story-Kat
blog.description:
Older than many and younger than some. I like what I like; you like what you like. Always remember, different is just different, it's not wrong. Opinions are wonderful they start conversations. Intolerance is unacceptable. Enjoy your stay.


*NOT SPOILER FREE*


Will occasionally post random pictures of my dice. Please forgive me one of my favorite obsessions.

blog.name: exchange-of-hearts
blog.title: Exchange of Hearts 2019
blog.description:
This Valentine's Day, celebrate love with us over at "Exchange of Hearts," an anime fanwork exchange open to both writers and artists.

We welcome any fanwork which can incorporate the concept of love in all its forms of expressions, whether it be romantic, platonic, or filial in nature.

body:

Please visit our tumblr site for the signup link!

Reblogs/retweets are much appreciated ❤️

summary: Scenario where the childhood friend of Deku and Kacchan get into 1-A and they haven't seen her since grade school but Kacchan...
question: Scenario where the childhood friend of Deku and Kacchan get into 1-A and they haven't seen her since grade school but Kacchan always pretends not to know her (It'd be great if he used to have a crush on her)
answer:
Of course! Such a sweet one. Making this a Bakugo x reader scenario, because I think it would be fun to write. Thank you for the request Anon!💕

When class 1-A heard that they would be having a new female student, wide smiled and sparkly eyes was pretty much on everyone’s looks.

They asked Aizawa if he could tell them some information about the new student. 

“Was she recommended?”
“What’s her name? And what’s her Quirk?”
“Is she hot?” *SMACK*

Questions were flying around the classroom. But they were immediately shut down by their homeroom teacher.

“I think she can introduce herself when she comes in.” Aizawa said and let out a sigh at the end.

When she comes in? Is she here now? Was the thought in everyone’s mind.

“(L/N). You can come in now.” Aizawa said emotionless.

The sound of your last name made Midoriya and Bakugo’s ears perk up. No, it surely couldn’t be you. You moved at the end of grade school- the two boys thoughts were interrupted when your figure walked into the classroom of future heroes.

Midoriya and Bakugo’s eyes widened when they saw you, as they remembered you from grade school. Only that you had gotten a lot taller. You were still shorter than them. You looked more grown up. Your confident attitude was still there, they could tell because you had always been confidents all the time the boys knew you. But also, you had gotten a lot prettier.

It was difficult for Bakugo to not blush at the sight of you. Since, he actually had a bit of a crush on you, before you moved away. He wanted to tell you, but he was too late, before you moved away.

You made eye contact with the two speechless boys and winked at them. Letting them know that you remembered them. You still had a way to make them smile or make them feel warm inside. 

Midoriya flushed red and hid his face in his hands. He wasn’t just warm inside because he got flustered by you, but also because he was really, really excited to see you. When you were younger, you used to hang out all the time.

Bakugo tried to look like he didn’t care and stared at the wall. His heart was beating faster and faster. That little crush he had on you before, might be coming back.

“Everyone, this is (L/N) (Y/N). You can ask her questions during lunch. I’m sure she’ll answer the questions you have for you.” You gave a nod to the teacher and got assigned to your desk at the back of the classroom.

You got short smiles from everyone in the classroom. And looks like, nice to meet you, and, let’s get to know each other. Which you responded with a friendly smile back.

The period had just ended, and it was time for lunch. But before you followed your fellow classmates to the cafeteria, you had to catch up with your childhood friends.

“Deku! Kacchan!” The people in question turned to you, with Midoriya giving you a big smile and a hug, and Bakugo only giving you a glare.

“(Y/N)! It’s been so long since last I saw you!” Midoriya said in excitement.

“I know! I just moved back to my old house, you know.” You looked towards Bakugo and smirked.

“Kacchan. Are you still the hot headed kid that you were before?” You teased.

Bakugo raised an eyebrow at you. “Eh? What do you mean? I don’t know who you are!”

You and Midoriya looked at each other like, yeah, right. And it was like that most of the time. Whenever you got paired up with Bakugo during a project or training, and you brought up some childhood memory you had together, Bakugo would always say: “What the hell are you talking about?! I don’t know you!” 

You knew that he was lying. He knew very well who you were. You were the first person he ever fell in love with, before he even knew what love was. It would irritate him every time he saw you hang out with Midoriya and support him through his Quirkless times. 

Back when you were kids, before you had gotten your Quirks, you three were really good friends. You could say that you were the glue that kept you together. But when you moved away, the same time as Bakugo developed his Quirk, everything just fell apart without you.

summary:
Did a little crossover between BNHA and Nanbaka since I finished watching BNHA a few days ago.
I made Mitsuru as Present Mic...
body:
Did a little crossover between BNHA and Nanbaka since I finished watching BNHA a few days ago.

I made Mitsuru as Present Mic since they are like the same person, the only difference is that P. Mic has a different skin tone and spaghetti hair, so I fucking love that guy.

And Momoko as Aizawa cuz she always gets annoyed with Mitsuru, so it’s the same with Eraser and Present Mic.

Anyways, enjoy the trash.

blog.name: spaceoceaniana
blog.title: Random regrettable thoughts
blog.description:
MANGA SPOILERS FOR:
 Attack on titan, my hero academia, pandora hearts, Tokyo ghoul (re), and black butler. Am i going to post about all of them? Probably not but just a warning ig. Anyways 
welcome to my blog aka random regrettable anime/manga thoughts that i had in my head since the beginning of the year or an hour ago. 

Ps. if any of my posts seem to be someone else's do let me know cause I had a lot of these things stuck in my head for months now so i wouldn't be surprised if someone already came up with them xD
